[Home](./index.md) &gt; [tsbuffer-schema](./tsbuffer-schema.md) &gt; [BufferTypeSchema](./tsbuffer-schema.buffertypeschema.md) &gt; [arrayType](./tsbuffer-schema.buffertypeschema.arraytype.md)

## BufferTypeSchema.arrayType property

有该字段，代表类型为该字段对应的TypedArray，否则该字段为ArrayBuffer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
arrayType?: 'Int8Array' | 'Int16Array' | 'Int32Array' | 'BigInt64Array' | 'Uint8Array' | 'Uint16Array' | 'Uint32Array' | 'BigUint64Array' | 'Float32Array' | 'Float64Array';
```
